nodes.bodyText: New features we are trying to start with io.openliberty instead of com.ibm.websphere.appserver

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@

nodes.bodyText: I'll also have to address this in servlet, el, & jsp.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+-include= ~${workspace}/cnf/resources/bnd/feature.props

nodes.bodyText: servlet will NOT be updated to io.openliberty prefix.  It is special because we need to support tolerates for servlet through 5.0.  el and jsp though can be updated yes.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+-include= ~${workspace}/cnf/resources/bnd/feature.props

nodes.bodyText: Should have eeCompatible-9.0 as one of the dependent features.

nodes.bodyText: Instead of Java API for WebSocket 2.0 should this just be Jakarta WebSocket 2.0?

nodes.bodyText: This seems unnecessary.  You can just add to websocket-2.0 to the EE9_FEATURES_ARRAY in this class.  You will also need to update the ee7 and ee8 array though to included websocket-1.x there as well.
The project name doesn't match the directory name.  The project name is right and hte directory name should be updated.  It should be websocket.2.0 not websocket-2.0

nodes.bodyText: Should the versions here and in the buildpath be updated?  2.0.0-RC1 or 2.0.0.RC1
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+
+#*******************************************************************************
+# Copyright (c) 2020 IBM Corporation and others.
+# All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
+# are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
+# which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
+# http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html
+#
+# Contributors:
+#     IBM Corporation - initial API and implementation
+#*******************************************************************************
+-include= ~../cnf/resources/bnd/bundle.props
+bVersion=1.0
+
+Bundle-SymbolicName: io.openliberty.jakarta.websocket.2.0; singleton:=true
+
+Export-Package: \
+	jakarta.websocket; version="2.0.0",\
+	jakarta.websocket.server; version="2.0.0"
+
+Include-Resource: \
+  @${repo;jakarta.websocket:jakarta.websocket-api;2.0}!/META-INF/LICENSE, \

nodes.bodyText:
Tired adding 2.0.0-RC1, but I'm getting errors:
error  : Exception: java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException: Unclosed group near index 9
\$(?:repo
        at java.base/java.util.regex.Pattern.error(Pattern.java:2027)
         …
_____________________
Script '/Users/siedlecki/libertyGit/open-liberty/dev/wlp-gradle/bndSettings.gradle' line: 169

* What went wrong:
A problem occurred evaluating script.
> Invalid syntax for version: 2.0.0-RC1

I looked at other Jakarta projects that use Release Candidate APIs, but I don't see them listing the the suffix either.
